## User Story

**As a** [role]  
**I want** [capability]  
**So that** [benefit]

**Priority**: P0 / P1 / P2 / P3  
**Effort**: X hours / days  
**Epic**: [Epic number]

## Acceptance Criteria

```gherkin
Feature: [Feature Name]
  As a [actor]
  I need to [action]
  So that [outcome]

  Scenario: [Scenario name]
    Given [precondition]
    When [action]
    Then [expected result]
    And [additional assertion]
```
